Translations.Text: Voistinu, bogoboyaznennym ugotovano blagodatnoye pribezhishche
sady i vinogradniki
polnogrudyye devy-rovesnitsy
i polnyye chashi
Tam oni ne uslyshat ni slovobludiya, ni lzhivogo slova
[Vse eto] - vozdayaniye, dar, plata ot Gospoda tvoyego
Gospoda nebes i zemli i togo, chto mezhdu nimi, Milostivogo, k kotoromu ne smozhet obratit'sya s rech'yu nikto iz nikh
v tot den', kogda Dukh (t. ye. Dzhibril) i angely vystroyatsya ryadami. Nikto ne stanet govorit', krome kak s dozvoleniya Milostivogo, i skazhet on tol'ko pravdu
Etot den' neizbezhno gryadet, i tot, kto zakhochet, naydet put' vozvrashcheniya k svoyemu Gospodu

Voistinu, My predosteregli vas o predstoyashchem v blizkom budushchem nakazanii v tot den', kogda chelovek voochiyu uzrit to, chto on vershil sobstvennymi rukami, i kogda voskliknet nevernyy: "Luchshe by mne byt' prakhom
Klyanus' angelami, istorgayushchimi [dushi nevernykh] s siloy
Klyanus' angelami, izvlekayushchimi [dushi veruyushchikh] s zhalost'yu
Klyanus' angelami, kotoryye pogruzhayutsya v glubinu [vod] [za dushami veruyushchikh]
Klyanus' angelami, kotoryye speshat, obgonyaya [drug druga]
Klyanus' angelami, ispolnyayushchimi veleniye [Allakha]
V tot den', kogda sotryasetsya sotryasayushchayasya
a za nim posleduyet [vtoroye] sotryaseniye
v tot den' serdtsa zatrepeshchut [ot strakha]
glaza potupyatsya
Oni sprashivayut: "Neuzheli my vernemsya v svoye prezhneye sostoyaniye
togda kak my byli istlevshimi kostyami
Oni govoryat takzhe: "Okh, nevygoden vozvrat v etot mir
I vot odin lish' trubnyy glas
i vse oni - na poverkhnosti zemli
Slyshal li ty [, Mukhammad,] rasskaz o Muse
